name: JCSGold
0:
”Alexa, ask JCSGold what is the price of gold”
”Alexa, ask JCSGold how silver is doing today”
”Alexa, tell JCSGold to give me the price of gold”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: j. c. s. gold
des:
A skill allows you to ask Alexa for the spot price of gold and silver. You simply ask JCSGold for the spot price and Alexa will tell you the current price. You can also ask JCSGold what they are currently paying for scrap gold.

We plan on adding more features in the future, so keep an eye out for new and exciting ways to interact with JCSGold and Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
